title: TRACK LAYOUT detail page Â» RACE TRACK
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want the TRACK LAYOUT detail page to show the connected RACE TRACK\
So I can quickly navigate to the other layouts that might exist for the RACE TRACK
description:
* The TRACK LAYOUT detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected RACE TRACK.
* The RACE TRACK is presented with its name and primary information.
* The RACE TRACK contains a link to its detail page.
* The RACE TRACK has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no RACE TRACK connected to the TRACK LAYOUT then the section is not displayed at all.
